displayName: What methods of payment do you accept
description: We accept Visa, Master Card, American Express and Afterpay

displayName: Is GST included in your quote
description: Yes, GST is clearly identified in the quote/invoice
Yes, we accept PayPal and Major Credit Cards

displayName: Do you accept wholesale/bulk job and offer wholesale pricing
description: We do a lot of wholesale work and will give you a quote dependant on the volume submitted

displayName: If the job is received damaged, what are my options
description: Contact us immediately and we will work on a solution that suits you

We do not accept returns if you have changed your mind. If goods are damaged in transit, they are covered by insurance. If there is a fault with the job we will fully rectify the problem to your satisfaction
Our Courier Service will deliver Australia Wide

displayName: Do you quote for delivery to specific country areas
description: Yes, we can quote delivery to any country area

displayName: Does your Courier carry parcel insurance
If my order arrives incomplete, what are my options
description: If some items are missing it may be a Courier problem and contact with the Courier company with your tracking number should resolve the problem

displayName: Will my order have a tracking number
description: When the parcel is picked up from us for transport, we will immediately advise you and provide the tracking number

displayName: Are your framing products(matts, backing etc,) acid free
description: All materials we use are of the highest standards and acid free

displayName: Can I purchase glass /mirrors cut to size
description: We can cut glass, mirrors, acrylic, corkboard to your specific requirements

displayName: Is it possible to see samples of the matts/ frames etc
description: If you are in Sydney, you can see samples at any of our stores or from the pictures on the web site

displayName: How long have you been in business
description: We are a family operated business and been in business over 20 years
Our main warehouse/workshop is in Zetland Sydney. We also have shops in Bondi, Clovelly, Double Bay, Mosman and Zetland

displayName: Are you open to the public
description: In addition to our stores, we are open to the public at Zetland (Alexandria)

displayName: Is local pickup of the job available
description: Your framing jobs can be picked up at any of our sites
